channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Predictive Maintenance Proving Out as Successful AI Use Case
item.description: By John P. Desmond, AI Trends Editor More companies are successfully exploiting predictive maintenance systems that combine AI and IoT sensors to coll...

item.title: Bond yields rise after Senate Democrats appear poised to back funding bill
item.description: Bond yields rose on Friday, responding to the general risk-on environment on news a U.S. government shutdown will be avoided.

item.title: Google DeepMind introduces two Gemini-based models to bring AI to the real world
item.description: DeepMind said both new Gemini models enable a variety of robots to perform a wider range of tasks than ever before. The post Google DeepMind introduce...

item.title: Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking now has memory and Google apps integration
item.description: Google makes Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking Experimental more personal by connecting more Google apps and services.

item.title: This startup just hit a big milestone for green steel production

item.title: SEER Robotics offers SRC controllers, portfolio to accelerate robot building
item.description: SEER Robotics says its safety robot controllers are among the offerings that make it a 'one-stop shop' for robot builders. The post SEER Robotics offe...

item.title: This annual shot might protect against HIV infections

item.title: My stepmother inherited 100% of my father’s estate. She’s leaving everything to her two kids. Is that fair?
item.description: “I had a wonderful relationship with my father.”

item.title: ‘It’s been a scary ride’: My family has $800K in stocks. We lost 2 years of market gains in a few weeks. Do we sell — or buy?
item.description: “I’m considering encouraging my family to liquidate part of their real-estate holdings to further invest in equities.”

item.title: ‘He is a Democrat and claims to be a nihilist’: I told my friend to sell his Tesla shares. He cut off contact. Is that normal?
item.description: “I’ve been trying to get him to diversify his retirement portfolio.”

item.title: There could be a nearly $1 trillion sale in U.S. stocks, regardless of what Americans do
item.description: Foreign investors reallocating money away from the U.S. could fuel a $1 trillion sell order on U.S. equities, a UBS strategist said Friday.

item.title: New technique helps LLMs rein in CoT lengths, optimizing reasoning without exploding compute costs
item.description: Carnegie Mellon University researchers propose a new LLM training technique that gives developers more control over chain-of-thought length.

item.title: Dexterity picks up $95M in funding for container unloading robots

item.title: Nvidia’s GTC keynote will emphasize AI over gaming
item.description: Don't expect to hear a lot about better framerates and raytracing at the Nvidia GTC keynote. AI will instead be the subject of the day.
